title: ValueError: too many value to unpack
body:
Hi, when I try to run the code on the default video12.mp4, it shows me two images and then throws and error.
![otsuiamge](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24694554/52043730-1098ed80-2506-11e9-9140-c28e6cd5c17f.png)
![videimage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24694554/52043731-1098ed80-2506-11e9-9e4b-e71364855212.png)
